mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Wolcott, Christopher P. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wolcott, Christopher P.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: [at top of telegram] Boddley[?] Pennsylvania FH Peirpoint John John W John P [body of telegram] His Ex Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling July 9 1862. By Telegraph from Washington 9 1862. The Department has not yet rec'd the letter which you stated you would write respecting the case of Pierre B. Witherel early answer is requested. CP Woolcott Asst Secy 25B110pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Wolcott, Christopher P.
Washington, D.C.
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
